member.name: F:Vit.WebHost.HostRunArg.allowAnyOrigin
member.summary: 是否允许跨域访问，默认true

member.name: F:Vit.WebHost.HostRunArg.staticFiles
member.summary: 映射静态文件，可不指定

member.name: F:Vit.WebHost.HostRunArg.RunAsync
member.summary: 是否异步运行.Runs a web application and returns a Task that only completes when the token is triggered or shutdown is triggered.

member.name: P:Vit.WebHost.StaticFilesConfig.rootPath
member.summary: 静态文件路径。可为相对路径或绝对路径。若为空或空字符串则为默认路径（wwwroot）。demo:"wwwroot"

member.name: P:Vit.WebHost.StaticFilesConfig.defaultFileNames
member.summary: 默认页面（可不指定）。An ordered list of file names to select by default. List length and ordering may affect performance

member.name: P:Vit.WebHost.StaticFilesConfig.useDirectoryBrowser
member.summary: 是否可浏览目录(default false)。Enables directory browsing

member.name: P:Vit.WebHost.StaticFilesConfig.responseHeaders
member.summary: 回应静态文件时额外添加的http回应头。可不指定。

member.name: P:Vit.WebHost.StaticFilesConfig.contentTypeMapFile
member.summary: 静态文件类型映射配置的文件路径。可为相对路径或绝对路径。例如"contentTypeMap.json"。若不指定（或指定的文件不存在）则不指定文件类型映射配置

member.name: P:Vit.WebHost.StaticFilesConfig.OnInitStaticFileOptions
member.summary: 初始化 wwwroot静态文件配置的操作
